txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Albino fur from the beasts far to the north and east of Echad Mirobel. Deliver the items to Maegamiel at Echad Mirobel in the southern section of Eregion.
'We will make good use of these. Thank you.'
'Furs and skins can be used for many purposes. Would you collect some for us?'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Albino Fur
Maegamiel at Echad Mirobel has requested that albino fur be delivered to her at the Elf-ruins in the southern reaches of Eregion.
Deliver the albino fur to Maegamiel at Echad Mirobel in southern Eregion
You have accepted a task to deliver albino fur from the beasts far to the north and east of Echad Mirobel to Maegamiel. Maegamiel defends Echad Mirobel in the southern area of Eregion.
Wanted: Albino fur from the beasts far to the north and east of Echad Mirobel.
